title: misc/xcode: update for Xcode 4.1
body:
by **dale@dalejefferson.com**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Mac OS Lion Xcode 4.1
2. Copy go.pbfilespec and go.xclangspec to ~/Library/Application 
Support/Developer/Shared/Xcode/Specifications/ 
3. Open Xcode

What is the expected output?

Syntax Highlighting

What do you see instead?

Nothing

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

6g

Which operating system are you using?

Mac OS X Lion

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

d292bc788668 (release-branch.r58) release/release.r58.1

Please provide any additional information below.
